item.title: About me
item.description: I'm a futurist who believes that science and technology are the answers to all of mankind's woes and I want to do my small part to make the world a better place. While I specialize in high-performance compute, graphics/rendering, I've been gravitating towards research in all fields related to computers (which, these, days is everything). nemo hominem est qui mundum non reddat meliorem In Latin, this means “What person is a person who does not make the world a better place?
